sys_ux_client_script.name: Emit CLSCHG Event

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_72728d3197a1311024d7b066f053af5b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="KLF Form default">5d75731797db1110b2e1f97e6253af65</macroponent><name>Emit CLSCHG Event</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    console.log('payload: '  + event.payload);
    api.emit('KLF_CLS#CLS_CHG', {
        "header": "Coming from the Log Payload"
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-28 13:10:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>72728d3197a1311024d7b066f053af5b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Emit CLSCHG Event</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo" source="x_53417_demo">785f7e9b97161110fa6733121153afdb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo">785f7e9b97161110fa6733121153afdb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_72728d3197a1311024d7b066f053af5b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-02 19:26:38</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
